title: Telegram Bot API parser data
description: Represents an object that contains the data parsed from official Telegram Bots API

info.title: Bot API information
info.description: Represents an object containing the actual information about parsed API, such as API version

apiVersion.title: Bot API version
apiVersion.description: Represents a Bot API version parsed from site, such as '6.0'

method.title: Bot API method
method.description: Represents a method parsed from official Telegram Bots API. It will be later mapped into request classes

methodName.title: Unique method name
methodName.description: Represents a method name parsed from site, such as 'sendLocation' or 'answerInlineQuery'

methodGroup.title: Group of method
methodGroup.description: Represents a group (section) name parsed from site, such as 'Updating messages' or 'Inline mode'

type.title: Bot API type
type.description: Represents a type parsed from official Telegram Bots API. It will be later mapped into type classes

typeName.title: Unique type name
typeName.description: Represents a type name parsed from site, such as 'Update' or 'InlineQueryResultGif'

typeGroup.title: Group of type
typeGroup.description: Represents a group (section) name parsed from site, such as 'Getting updates' or 'Inline mode'

parameter.title: Parameter of either Bot API method or type

parameterName.title: Parameter name
parameterName.description: Represents unique parameter name in snake_case format

parameterTypeName.title: Parameter type name
parameterTypeName.description: Represents .NET fully qualified name of type or its short alias for this parameter

isRequired.title: Parameter requirement
isRequired.description: Determines whether this parameter is required or not

descriptionEntity.title: Entity of Bot API description
descriptionEntity.description: Represents an information about URLs or code formatting of description, if any

entityText.title: Description entity text
entityText.description: Name of method or type this entity is referring to, or text to be replaced with entity value

entityKind.title: Description entity kind
entityKind.description: Kind of element this entity is referring to (either 'Method', 'Type' or 'Url')
